transfer-to-vault-detail: Deposit funds from treasury to the treasury vault. The action required confirmation of owners to complete depositing.
treasury-balance-detail: Total calculateable value of all your deposited tokens in treasury in USD.
transfer-to-treasury-detail: Withdraw funds from treasury vault to treasury. The action required confirmation of owners to complete withdrawing.
treasury-vault-balance-detail: Total calculateable value of all your deposited tokens in treasury vault in USD.
deposit-description: Deposit assets into your treasury wallet. These assets would be deposited from zebec wallet.
withdraw-description: Withdraw your deposited treasury assets. Assets would be directly deposited to wallet after confirmations.
empty: There are no pending confirmation transactions. The recent withdraw, deposit and transfer transactions you create will appear here.
